ios.buildCommand: xcodebuild -workspace ios/App/App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -archivePath build/App.xcarchive archive

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Pit-Box needs access to your photo library so you can select and attach images to your racing sessions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pit-Box needs permission to save images and videos from your racing sessions to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Pit-Box needs access to your camera to capture photos and videos during your racing sessions.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Pit-Box needs access to your microphone to record audio during video capture of your racing sessions.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Pit-Box uses your location while the app is in use to show track-related information and improve your session data.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Pit-Box uses your location to track your racing sessions and provide accurate track mapping even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Pit-Box uses your location to track your racing sessions and provide accurate track mapping.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Pit-Box uses motion data to track acceleration, braking, and cornering forces during your racing sessions.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Pit-Box needs Bluetooth access to connect to racing telemetry devices and sensors.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Pit-Box needs Bluetooth access to connect to racing telemetry devices and sensors.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Pit-Box can add your race events and track days to your calendar.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Pit-Box can create reminders for upcoming racing events and maintenance schedules.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Pit-Box can access your contacts to help you share your racing data with friends and teammates.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Pit-Box uses speech recognition for voice commands while you're driving.
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Pit-Box needs local network access to connect to racing equipment and telemetry devices on the same network.
infoPlist.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Pit-Box can access your music library to play your favorite tracks during sessions.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Pit-Box uses Face ID to secure your racing data and settings.
